item.title: Get started
item.description: Get startedIn this guide, you will get started with Cloudflare Pages, and deploy your first website to the Pages platform. There are three ways to set up a Pages project: Connecting your Git provider to Pages. Deploying your prebuilt assets right to Pages with Direct Uploads. Using Wrangler from the command line. This guide will take you through the Git setup option. ​â€‹ Connect your Git provider to Pages Pages offers support for GitHub External link icon Open external link and GitLab External link icon Open external link .
